title: Serendipity
overview: Jian Mingshu, the daughter of the Jian family, survives a family massacre after accidentally falling off a cliff and losing her memory. Rescued by her love, Lu Chang, they journey together to the capital for exams. As Mingshu investigates her mysterious origins, she faces challenges but is secretly protected by Lu Chang. Through shared trials, their bond deepens, and they ultimately confirm their love, deciding to spend their lives together.Adapted from the novel "Bang Xia Gui Xu (榜下贵婿)" by Luo Ri Qiang Wei (落日薔薇).
